column4: Has anyone seen a problem related to mine: I cannot run a terminal in GDM!  Not gnome-terminal, not multi-gnome-terminal, nor x-terminal-emulator
Work around/temporary fix... ctrl+alt+f1 gets you to a terminal only... ctrl+alt+f7 brings you back
I know i can get to the tty - but i'd kind of like a terminal in my gui too... plus all my shortcuts to bash scripts don't work and so on
